duties_responsibilities.duty: Become an expert in Oracle’s NetSuite company-owned CRM/ERP system and provide support to the sales team in quoting, pricing structure, and contracting.
Ensure the accuracy of quotes and orders for standard, mid-level, and complex deals and provide reports and analysis to sales management.
Review and edit sales contracts within defined guidelines and administer deal registration process.
Identify and suggest possible resolution in system gaps and processes to better streamline efficient workflow and enhance sales productivity.
Handle ad hoc projects related to deal structuring and contracting for B2B SaaS companies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Sales, or related field (Master's preferred)
